item.title: Jugglers
item.description: Think of it for a moment We are all jugglers, aren’t we? Always juggling problems throughout life With no option at all to break free There’s someone out there somewhere Crippled with a massive debt There’s someone else also somewhere Reeling through the H1B visa bet There’s someone out there somewhere Recovering from a painful breakup There’s someone out there somewhere Struggling to assemble things for his startup There’s someone out there with a smiling face

item.title: तरीका - Tareeqa
item.description: For people who can read Hindi: तरीका शायद गलत था पर इरादा सही तरीका शायद गलत था पर इरादा सही माफ़ कर दीजिये हमें मोहतरमा यह रास्ता नहीं आज़माता तोह शायद आप आते ही नहीं For people who cannot read Hindi: Tareeqa shayad galat tha par irada sahi Tareeqa shayad galat tha par irada sahi Maaf kar dijiye humein mohotorma, Yeh raasta nahi aazmata toh shayad aap aate hi nahi

item.title: Give Me A Chance
item.description: Give me a chance to not be a dunce. Give me a chance to be with you once. Give me a chance to rectify my mistake. Give me a chance to put everything for you at stake. Give me a chance to have your head on my shoulder. Give me a chance to protect you like a soldier. Give me a chance to cook for you when hungry. Give me a chance to calm you down when angry.

item.title: The French Kiss
item.description: I finally reached Paris I was missing someone dearly I craved to hold her hands And adore the 320 meter tall beauty The city of love as it is popularly called A few men knelt down on the ground Expressing feelings to their lady love Such was the scene all around A few couples approched me Requesting me to take their picture The man passionately smooched his lady I was their exclusive photographer

item.title: The Venetian Night
item.description: Over an old rickety bridge Where a canal connects with the sea Stands a man in Venice Who is dumbstruck by its beauty Vintage buildings lined on the streets Fresh flowers present everywhere People waiting to board the boats Aimlessly going here and there Young couples making love Old couples walking holding hands The aroma of the Italian food Along with performances by local bands In midst of all these
